amendment.description: To strike sections 842 relative to a conforming standard for waiver of domestic source or content requirement and 843 relative to the consistency with United States obligations under trade agreements.

action.text: Amendment SA 3197 was rendered moot when Amendment SA 3461 was agreed to.

Amendment SA 3197 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S7071; text: CR S7071) To strike sections 842 relative to a conforming standard for waiver of domestic source or content requirement and 843 relative to the consistency with United States obligations under trade agreements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3197 proposed by Senator Dayton.
